allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Rename KernelClientRegistry to KernelClientManager

Renames KernelClientRegistry to KernelClientManager to align with
Jupyter Server naming conventions (e.g., MultiKernelManager,
KernelManager).

Changes:
- Renamed client_registry.py to client_manager.py
- Updated class name from KernelClientRegistry to KernelClientManager
- Updated all imports and references throughout the codebase
- Updated method names: _get_client_registry() -> _get_client_manager()
- Updated settings key: "client_registry" -> "client_manager"
- Updated README and documentation to reflect new naming
EOF
)")
